## EventHandlerOf type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EventHandlerOf<EventMap extends DefaultEventMap, EventType extends AnyEventTypeOf<EventMap>> = EventMap[EventType] extends void ? () => void : (event: EventMap[EventType]) => void;
```
